data.message: Is that still Scotland? And nice wordplay, as usual👌😉

replies.message: No, Leeds is not in Scotland.
OK. I honestly didn't know, so I'm not sure why I'm getting angry emojis.
England 🤦‍♂️
Simon West thank you!
He is playing tonight at Leeds festival, it's not Scotland, it's in West Yorkshire
another ignorant american spotted..smfh
Are you serious???????
Just stop. I've never traveled to Europe obviously. It doesn't give you the right to bully.
It's beautiful.. most of England is.
Peter Jechev Aleksander Kostov
I imagine so, Rebecca Hardy. That's on my bucket list to visit one day.
I am from Worcestershire, live outside of Detroit, England is beautiful grew up there, but not at this dam concert :(

Keylais Melissa Cross I was merely showing you that it isn't in Scotland. There's absolutely no need for everyone being such idiots about it, it was a simple and appropriate question. I'm pretty sure that everyone giving you hate isn't exactly world travelled and they certainly don't know where every city is in every single country. Don't let the twats bother you.
Keylais Melissa Cross you should.. it's definitely worth it, miss the countryside and the people.
Justin Hardwick no worries, I'm not. It's just words on a screen. I'm a fan just like them so I can comment even if it is a silly question. 😋
Rebecca Hardy I'm in Michigan also. Northern Michigan, to be exact. Been here 17 years!
It really wasn't a silly question though. And I'm also a fan, have been since Off The Wall and his early stuff with Proof😄
Where? I am 30 minutes from Detroit.. from England to Detroit what a difference lol!
Love Eminem.. no one's streaming it tho
Justin Hardwick my first exposure was the Shady LP. I was hooked since. I even de-stress by listening to Way I Am when I have a Fuck the World attitude.
Rebecca Hardy Petoskey. Moved from Lansing to there in 07.
Thanks Josip Mareljić I'll do that when Google decides to load. Right now, it's not, so I asked. Hope your day is going well
Josip Mareljić get over yourself

Tbf I laughed when I read this comment cause to me it's so obvious this isn't Scotland, but then I remembered if you weren't from England so you probably wouldn't know 😂 be warned though you are going to get a lot of angry Englanders calling you an ignorant American (probably cause they're ignorant and mean themself!) 😂
